name: Jigty Jelly
description:
Dive deep into the underwater wonderland of Jigty Jelly! If you love casual or match 3 games, you’ll love the aquatic arena of Jigty Jelly. This is one of the most casual, fun games you’ll play all year. Connect the cute, colorful jellies to see them pop, pop, POP!

JOIN THE UNDERWATER FUN: Is the world above the waves boring? Come down to the wonderful underwater world of Jigty Jelly where fun is yours for the popping!

CONNECT CUTE JELLIES: Sling jellies of the same color together to merge them.

UNLOCK NEW LEVELS: Pop all the jellies without running out of moves, and you’ll unlock more amazing new levels.

WATCH OUT! There’s a sneaky sea urchin about. Make sure the jellies don’t touch him or they’ll multiply!

POP! POP! POP!: Feel your troubles float away with every pop of the jellies.

Jigty Jelly is currently only available in English.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money
